meanings.definition: A stadium or arena where baseball games are played.
meanings.sent1: We went to three different ballparks to watch baseball games.
meanings.sent2: The local ballpark is where the community gathers to enjoy baseball.
meanings.sent3: The ballparks were so crowded that we had to sit in the grass to watch the game.
meanings.sent4: Her love for baseball was as vast as the number of ballparks she visited.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the ballpark illuminated the night sky, creating a magical atmosphere.
